Whenever t__ orchestra pla___ a po___ or wa___, Welk himself wo___ dance wi__ the band's female sin___, cal___ a `` Champagne Lady '' o_ the sh__. data.fullContent: The show had a "bubble machine." Whenever the orchestra played a polka or waltz, Welk himself would dance with the band's female singer, called a `` Champagne Lady '' on the show. His first Champagne Lady was Jayne Walton Rosen ( her real name was Dorothy Jayne Flanagan ). Rocky Rockwell would usually sing novelty songs. Welk would also have one song each show where he would play an accordion solo.
data.answer: 这个节目有一个“泡泡机”。每当乐队演奏波尔卡或华尔兹舞曲时，威尔克自己就会和乐队的女歌手一起跳舞，这位女歌手在节目中被称为“香槟女郎”。他的第一位香槟女郎是杰恩·沃尔顿·罗森(她的真名是多萝西·杰恩·弗拉纳根)。罗克韦尔通常会唱一些新奇的歌曲。威尔克还会在每场演出中演奏一首手风琴独奏。
